flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: As described on TV Tropes [EMBED TV TROPES LINK HERE] the Xanatos Gambit is a plan where all outcomes benefit the benefactor. I will now show you how to make your own Xanatos Gambit and win at everything, all the time.
guide.introduction_rendered: As described on TV Tropes [EMBED TV TROPES LINK HERE] the Xanatos Gambit is a plan where all outcomes benefit the benefactor. I will now show you how to make your own Xanatos Gambit and win at everything, all the time.

lines.text: This is not one.  This is a puppy.  Puppies are not humans they are dogs.  Therefore dogs are not worthy challengers.
lines.text_raw: This is not one.  This is a puppy.  Puppies are not humans they are dogs.  Therefore dogs are not worthy challengers.

guide.summary: How to win at everything, period.
guide.title: The Xanatos Gambit
